Comments_List: My Persian certainly improved over the length of this course, and I am very grateful to this course for doing this.

The strength of this course is the commitment by the teacher and the equal engagement by the student. A weakness, if any, is in the diversity of engagement with the Persian world. It would be interesting to do, for example, simple passage reading or listening exercises from something else other than the textbook, which can be a little dry.
Yes, Prof. Shayesteh is a great tutor and provides a thorough and clear introduction to the Persian language.
